apps.name: Bitwarden
apps.description: An open source password manager with End-to-End encryption and cross-platform support. Bitwarden makes it easy to generate, store, and secure unique passwords from any location or device.

apps.name: KeePassDX
apps.description: A multi-format KeePass manager for Android devices. The app allows creating keys and passwords in a secure way by integrating with the Android design standards.
